titles.title: Recognizing the exemplary service of General Mark Milley, United States Army, 20th Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, and his wife, Hollyanne Milley, a registered nurse of 36 years and military community leader.

Recognizing the exemplary service of General Mark Milley, United States Army, 20th Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, and his wife, Hollyanne Milley, a registered nurse of 36 years and military community leader.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the service of General Mark Milley and his wife, Hollyanne Milley.
